text: Wu Shuqing (; 3 January 1932 â€“ 10 January 2020) was a Chinese economist and educator. He was President of Peking University from August 1989 to August 1996 and vice-president of Renmin University of China. He was born in Jiangyin, Jiangsu. On 10 January 2020, he died of an illness at the Beijing Hospital, aged 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese writers Category:Chinese economists Category:Chinese educators Category:People from Jiangsu Category:20th-century Chinese writers
title: Wu Shuqing (economist)
